biotools.summary:
Gaussian process modeling of longitudinal data from paired multi-condition studies.
PairGP, a non-stationary Gaussian process method to compare gene expression timeseries across several conditions that can account for paired longitudinal study designs and can identify groups of conditions that have different gene expression dynamics.

bioschemas.name: PairGP
